content: --अनुप्रासः one of the five kinds of अनुप्रास, ‘the single alliteration’, which is a similarity occurring {%once%} (or singly) and in more than one way among a collection of consonants; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} आदाय बकुलगंधानंधीकुर्वन्पदे पदे भ्रमरान् . अयमेति मंदमंदं कावेरीवारिपावनः पवनः .. <ls>S. D. 634.</ls>
